thread.section_title: OptiContacts.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OptiContacts.com | opticontacts.com
thread.title: Dawn Jenkins

author: Dawn Jenkins
title: Dawn Jenkins
text: I placed an order earlier this month not realizing my doctor gave me two different types of contact lenses one for astigmatism and the other without. The people at Opticontacts.com contacted me right away to note the discrepancy and corrected my order right away. I also received my contacts sooner then expected. I will definitely be using this company again. Fast and easy just how I like it.
